mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) VALUES (seq_reply.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply = #{reply}, updateDate = SYSDATE WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(tbl_board idx_reply) */ ROWNUM rn, bno, rno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} AND rno > 0 AND ROWNUM <= ${cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(rno) FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno}
